content.text: An Asset Downtime Report provides a summary of Asset Downtime during a defined time period including mean time between failures and mean time to repair.
1. Navigate to REPORTS > ASSETS > ASSET DOWNTIME
2. Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field

Available report criteria: Date Range - The time period in which downtime was reported. Date Field - Select between Time Down and Time Up. Asset Selection (optional) - Generate results specific to a particular Asset(s). Sub Category Selection - Select the Sub Category for the Assets to include in the report. Show Chart - Toggle downtime chart on and off
3. Select Run Report
The report populates based on selected criteria and is displayed above the report and is now available to be exported:
To change any of the report criteria, select Edit Criteria

content.title: Create a Total Cost of Ownership Report

content.text: A total cost of ownership for your assets from maintenance costs and labor, to depreciation and logs.
1. Navigate to Reports > Assets > Total Cost of Ownership.
2. Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field

Available report criteria: Group By - Choose whether to group results by Category/Sub Type or Status. Asset Selection (optional) - Generate results specific to a particular Asset(s). Include Inactive Assets - Select this option to include Inactive Assets in the report. Show Chart - Toggle KPI chart on and off to show a visual representation of costs on the report
3. Select Run Report
The report populates based on selected criteria and is displayed above the report and is now available to be exported:
To change any of the report criteria, select Update Criteria

content.title: Create an Asset Log Summary Report

content.text: An Asset Log Summary Report provides a snapshot of all the current logs and meter readings for your Assets.
1. Navigate to Reports > Assets > Log Summary.
2. Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field

Available report criteria: Log Types - Select the Log Type to generate report results for. Group By - Select whether to group results by Asset or Log Type. Asset Selection (optional) - Generate results specific to a particular Asset(s)
3. Select Run Report
The report populates based on selected criteria and is displayed above the report and is now available to be exported:
To change any of the report criteria, select Edit Criteria
